name: Hwei

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Signature of the Visionary
passive.description: Innate:  Hwei's damaging abilities mark enemies hit for a short time. Damaging them with a different ability consumes the mark to create an explosion at their location that deals magic damage in an area.
passive.description_source:
The ability that consumes the mark cannot apply it on the same cast instance.
The mark cannot be triggered from the same cast instance of an ability, even if the triggering ability was empowered by  Stirring Lights.
The explosion occurs around the marked target from where they were when the ability damaged them to consume the mark.
In other words, the explosion is at the location of where they were hit, not where they are at the end of the delay.
The target who had their mark consumed is able to escape the area of the explosion within the delay period.
Enemies can be damaged by multiple explosions at once.
 Spell shield will block both the mark and its consumption as well as the detonation.
The indicator for the effect telegraphs an unusually smaller radius than it actually hits.(bug)

basic_ability_1.name: Subject: Disaster
basic_ability_1.description:
Active:  Hwei enters a disastrous mood, gaining access to its abilities as well as  Wash Brush. He will exit the mood upon casting any of them.
 Devastating Fire (QQ)
 Severing Bolt (QW)
 Molten Fissure (QE)
basic_ability_1.description_source:
Toggled abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as  Spellblade and triggering  Force Pulse's passive.
Hwei cannot rank up this ability while he is in a mood.

basic_ability_2.name: Subject: Serenity
basic_ability_2.description:
Active:  Hwei enters a serene mood, gaining access to its abilities as well as  Wash Brush. He will exit the mood upon casting any of them.
 Fleeting Current (WQ)
 Pool of Reflection (WW)
 Stirring Lights (WE)
basic_ability_2.description_source:
Toggled abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as  Spellblade and triggering  Force Pulse's passive.
Hwei cannot rank up this ability while he is in a mood.

basic_ability_3.name: Subject: Torment
basic_ability_3.description:
Active:  Hwei enters a tumultuous mood, gaining access to its abilities as well as  Wash Brush. He will exit the mood upon casting any of them.
 Grim Visage (EQ)
 Gaze of the Abyss (EW)
 Crushing Maw (EE)
basic_ability_3.description_source:
Toggled abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as  Spellblade and triggering  Force Pulse's passive.
Hwei cannot rank up this ability while he is in a mood.

ultimate.name: Spiraling Despair
ultimate.description: Active:  Hwei launches a globule in the target direction that collides with the first enemy  champion hit, afflicting them with an aura that grows over a few seconds. Enemies within are continually dealt magic damage and gradually  slowed.
ultimate.description_source:
Applies  persistent area damage for the aura and deals  area damage for the explosion.
 Spell shield can block the aura, explosion, and the application of the first Despair stack.
This ability will cast from wherever the caster is at the end of the cast time.
